      Returns the list of players.
      Methods in ss.qwirkle.common with parameters of type Player 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void Game.addPlayer(Player p)
      Adds a player to the list of players.
      void Game.doMove(Player p, Move move)
      Performs a move for a player by sending it to the board and passing any exceptions back to the player.
      void Game.giveTiles(Player p)
      Gives tiles to the specified player to fill up their hand.
      void Game.nextTurn(Player p)
      Tells the game to advance to the next player's turn.
      void Game.tradeTiles(Player p, java.util.List<Tile> tiles)
      Gives tiles to the specified player in exchange for some of their tiles.

      A Player that makes use of a set Behaviour to determine its moves.
      class  HumanPlayer
      A Player that is controlled by the local user.
      class  SocketPlayer
      A player that is controlled by a remote user over a socket.
